headline: SPELLMAN HIGH VOLTAGE POWER SUPPLY, 10 kV
description: Shipborne Power Feed Equipment (P.F.E.) Used on cable laying ships for submarine fiber optic telecomunication cable installations.
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > High Voltage Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer Spellman
Model SR10PN16/X2833
Maximum Output Voltage 10.0 kV
Maximum Output Current 1,600.0 mA
Bipolar Yes
Panel Meters Digital
Accessories


Control Inter Connect Cables

High Voltage Inter Connect Cables

Output High Voltage Cable is not included,
3M (10') HV cable add $180, inquire about longer cables

Other Information


System Consist of The Following :

M/N SR10PN16/X2833 (Master)
P/N X2833 Rev 1

M/N SR10PN16/X2833 (Slave)
P/N X2833 Rev 1

M/N SR10PN16/X2833(2nd Slave)
P/N X2833 Rev 1

M/N SR10PN/X2833 (Clamp Chassis)
P/N X2833 Rev 1

Solid State Dummy Load

Maximum output current of 1.6A is for the master and two slaves combined

We will not honor our 90 day warranty if this power supply will be used for the spark gap applications

Power Requirements 220 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Height 10.500 in (26.7 cm)
